comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: all version

    Hi, I'm Black, a web developer. As we know, AJAX is apply widely, and rich user interface web application are popular. AJAX utilities like dojo, ext are more and more important, but there is problem, the large js script transport on the network slow the web page first load. So, is there a method to make these java script lib into the browser? This will reduce the web page load time.
   Alternative approach is that the browser can supply a interface which user can plug their js lib into the browser.
   Is it possible?

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
null
comments.author: dong_yu_xue@163.com
